ref: 11433 váśya ʻ to be subjected, obedient ʼ, in cmpd. or with gen. ʻ at the disposal of ʼ MBh. [váśa -- ]
Pk. vassa -- ʻ subject, subjected to ʼ;
Kho. (Lor.) b*lš ʻ verbal enclitic with obl. of inf. to express necessity, propriety, obligation, ability ʼ;
Sh. baš ʻ particle with inf. to express necessity ʼ;
L. vassā ʻ capable, fit, able, worthy ʼ;
P. vass, bass m. ʻ power, authority ʼ.
